CustomField.formula: AND( CASE( Brand__c, "Knob Creek", IF(!Purchase_Order_Uploaded__c, 1, 0), "Makers Mark", IF( AND(!Purchase_Order_Uploaded__c, !ISBLANK ( SKU_from_Barrel__c )), 1, 0), "El Tesoro", IF( AND(!Purchase_Order_Uploaded__c, !ISBLANK ( SKU_from_Barrel__c )), 1, 0), 0) == 1 )
CustomField.label: Missing PO?
